control_attributes.Control: SC-8 (1) CRYPTOGRAPHIC OR ALTERNATE PHYSICAL PROTECTION
control_attributes.control_description: The information system implements cryptographic mechanisms to [Selection (one or more): prevent unauthorized disclosure of information; detect changes to information] during transmission unless otherwise protected by [Assignment: organization-defined alternative physical safeguards].
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system protects the [Selection (one or more): confidentiality; integrity] of [Assignment: organization-defined information at rest].

Control Statement: The information system implements cryptographic mechanisms to [Selection (one or more): prevent unauthorized disclosure of information; detect changes to information] during transmission unless otherwise protected by [Assignment: organization-defined alternative physical safeguards].
Control Name: SC-8 (1) CRYPTOGRAPHIC OR ALTERNATE PHYSICAL PROTECTION
